basic.blooming: Flowering period June-July, fruiting period October-November
basic.color: Flower color white or purple, fruit color purple

maintenance.soil: Soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients, pH value between 6-7
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, high quality fruits in sunny places
maintenance.watering: Like moist, provide more water during flowering and fruiting period
maintenance.fertilization: Enjoy much fertilizer, soil with rich compost when planting, and apply more fertilizer during fruiting period
maintenance.pruning: Thin out seedlings timely and remove over crowded leaves
